main event: Several witnesses reported seeing a small-shaped light in the sky over Qutdlingssat, Greenland, on 13 January 1959.
interesting points: The object exhibited bright radiating light resembling jet exhaust., There were multiple sightings with intervals of red signal lighting., The sighting characteristics are similar to that of a fireball., Observations included reports of fast-moving objects at high speeds., Two meteor showers occurred during the timeframe of the sightings.
witness description: reports by several persons at Quiquissatsoq
